thread.title: Excellent stay!
thread.title_full: Excellent stay! - Review of Seton Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Liolol
title: Excellent stay!
text: I stayed here for three nights in mid December. LOVED IT! I have stayed at Hiltons in the past which were not as good as this hotel! The room is big, has comfy beds, excellent pressure in the showers, immaculate, and in a GREAT location! It is located in Midtown - which is central to everything. Grand Central is around 7 minutes away by foot from what I can remember. I would stay here again when I come back to NYC.
